title: 'Til the Cows Come Home
description: 'Thomas, you'd better get out of that bed and get dressed for school or you'll be lying there 'til the cows come home!' Inspired by a kindergarten student's curiosity, Judy Perry Drewett, writes about Thomas, a little boy with a vivid imagination. Follow Thomas and his imagination as he begins to see cows everywhere he goes. 'Til the Cows Come Home is a story to be enjoyed by young and old alike.
author: Judy Perry Drewett
